tool.name: OGS: ipDataToPointCloud
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'ipDataToPointCloud'.
tool.command: for i in $input_file; do if [ "$i" != "None" ] && [ ! -e "$(basename $i)" ]; then ln -s "$i" "$(basename $i)"; fi; done; ipDataToPointCloud --input-file '$input_file.element_identifier' --output-file output_1.vtu
tool.help: This tool runs the **ipDataToPointCloud** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
